A not-for-profit organisation which offers support to enable people with a learning disability to live in their own home. Support includes counselling, advice, advocacy and lifeskills. 4 units in service. Also plans to provide outreach support. Self or any referral. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
This organisation offers advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget. Will also recruit a personal assistant and employ a personal assistant.
